vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrance.withdraw (patch_3.sol#16-25):

	- msg.sender.call.value(_amount)() (patch_3.sol#21-23)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- locked (patch_3.sol#22)
